analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
dve me bhikkhave dhammā a tapanīyā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco katakalyāṇo hoti, katakusalo, katabhīruttāṇo, akatapāpo, akataluddo, akatakibbiso.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kata kalyāṇaḥ hoti kata kusalaḥ kata bhīruttāṇaḥ akata pāpaḥ akata luddaḥ akata kibbisaḥ

original: So ‘kataṁ me kalyāṇan’tipi na tappati, ‘akataṁ me pāpan’tipi na tappati.
analyzed: saḥ katam me kalyāṇantipi na tappati a katam me pāpantipi na tappati

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā a tapanīyā ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
